languages.text: {n}Вы с трудом разлепляете веки. Когда мир обретает цельность, вы осознаете, что смотрите на собственные ладони из собственных глазниц. Вы двигаете рукой, и каждая мышца благодарно отзывается разливающимся внутри теплом. Окружающие смотрят на вас со смесью надежды и ужаса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы с трудом разлепляете веки. Когда мир обретает цельность, вы осознаете, что смотрите на собственные ладони из собственных глазниц. На вас — ваше тело и одежда. Вы двигаете рукой, и каждая мышца благодарно отзывается разливающимся внутри теплом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы с трудом разлепляете веки. Когда мир обретает цельность, вы осознаете, что смотрите на собственные ладони из собственных глазниц. Вы двигаете рукой, и каждая мышца благодарно отзывается разливающимся внутри теплом. Окружающие смотрят на вас со смесью надежды и ужаса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. Once the world is whole, you realise that you are staring at your own palms from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully with the warmth blooming inside. The others watch you with a mix of hope and dismay.{/n}

{n}You struggle to open your eyes. Once the world is whole, you realise that you are staring at your own palms from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully with the warmth blooming inside. The others watch you with a mix of hope and dismay.{/n}

You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully to the warmth blooming inside. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully to the warmth blooming inside. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

{n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

{n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你挣扎着睁开眼睛时，你眼前的世界再次成型。你意识到，你此刻正通过你自己的眼球，盯着你自己的手掌。当你抬起手时，你身体的每块肌肉都完美地做出了反应，充满了温暖与力量。其他人也都盯着你，有的面带喜悦，有的惶恐不安。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你挣扎着睁开眼睛时，你眼前的世界再次成型。你意识到，你此刻正通过你自己的眼球，盯着你自己的手掌。当你抬起手时，你身体的每块肌肉都完美地做出了反应，充满了温暖与力量。其他人也都盯着你，有的面带喜悦，有的惶恐不安。{/n}

languages.text: {n}まぶたを開こうと必死にもがいた。世界が再び形を取り戻したとき、自分の目のくぼみから、自分自身の手のひらを見つめていることに気づく。手を動かせば、ひとつひとつの筋肉が、内から芽生えるような温もりに喜んで応えた。周囲の者たちは、希望と困惑の入り混じったまなざしで、こちらを見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}まぶたを開こうと必死にもがいた。世界が再び形を取り戻したとき、自分の目のくぼみから、自分自身の手のひらを見つめていることに気づく。手を動かせば、ひとつひとつの筋肉が、内から芽生えるような温もりに喜んで応えた。周囲の者たちは、希望と困惑の入り混じったまなざしで、こちらを見つめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te cuesta abrir los ojos. Cuando por fin el mundo cobra forma de nuevo, adviertes que estás contemplando las palmas de tus propias manos con tus propios ojos. Pruebas a mover una mano y te alivia comprobar que tus músculos responden con una sensación de calidez. Los demás te observan con una mezcla de esperanza y consternación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te cuesta abrir los ojos. Cuando por fin el mundo cobra forma de nuevo, adviertes que estás contemplando las palmas de tus propias manos con tus propios ojos. Pruebas a mover una mano y te alivia comprobar que tus músculos responden con una sensación de calidez. Los demás te observan con una mezcla de esperanza y consternación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini açmak için çabalıyorsun. Dünya yeniden şekillendikten sonra kendi göz çukurlarından kendi avuç içlerine baktığını fark ediyorsun. Bir elini oynatıyorsun, her kasın minnetle karşılık verip ısınıyor. Odadaki diğerleri sana umut ve dehşet karışımı bir duyguyla bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini açmak için çabalıyorsun. Dünya yeniden şekillendikten sonra kendi göz çukurlarından kendi avuç içlerine baktığını fark ediyorsun. Bir elini oynatıyorsun, her kasın minnetle karşılık verip ısınıyor. Odadaki diğerleri sana umut ve dehşet karışımı bir duyguyla bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous peinez à ouvrir les yeux. Une fois que le monde a repris forme, vous réalisez que vous fixez vos propres paumes... avec vos propres yeux ! Vous bougez une main et chaque muscle répond avec gratitude en s'emplissant de chaleur. Les autres vous observent avec un mélange d'espoir et de désarroi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous peinez à ouvrir les yeux. Une fois que le monde a repris forme, vous réalisez que vous fixez vos propres paumes... avec vos propres yeux ! Vous bougez une main et chaque muscle répond avec gratitude en s'emplissant de chaleur. Les autres vous observent avec un mélange d'espoir et de désarroi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, deine Augen zu öffnen. Nachdem die Welt wieder Gestalt angenommen hat, erkennst du, dass du mit deinen eigenen Augen auf deine Handflächen starrst. Als du eine Hand bewegst, danken es dir alle Muskeln, indem sie sich mit Wärme füllen. Die anderen betrachten dich mit einer Kombination aus Hoffnung und Bestürzung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to open your eyes. After the world has once again taken shape, you realise that you are staring at your own palms, from your own eye sockets. You move a hand, and each muscle responds gratefully, filling with warmth. The others watch you with a mixture of hope and dismay.{/n}
